pages.text: MIDI (Musical Instrument Digital Interface) is a computer protocol used by digital instruments to transmit data about notes being played ($(italic)messages$()) to a computer and vice versa.$(br2)MIDI has been around since the early 1980s and is still used as an industry standard protocol today.

pages.title: MIDI and MIMI
pages.text: MIMI (Musical Instrument Minecraft Interface) is an implementation of the MIDI protocol within Minecraft.$(br2)MIMI allows you to craft a wide variety of instruments and gives you the ability to play them directly with your keyboard or with MIDI via a MIDI Device (such as a digital Piano) or MIDI File (essentially a recording of MIDI messages that can be played back).
